column5: Welcome To Your Personal Hill Country Get-Away!  This amazing property sits on 3.5 acres of rolling hills with breathe taking views!  Driving past all the hustle and bustle of the city, you will arrive to a gorgeous stucco home, nestled among native mountain laurels and colorful perennials. More importantly, you and your guests will have ample PARKING! Take advantage of the 3 car garage or the granite parking pad directly in front of the home that can occupy 5 full vehicles!
column8: Country Estate 5 Min From Medina Lake!
